meanings.definition: A type of headgear worn by men in parts of Central Asia, typically made of felt and shaped like a rounded cap with a flat top.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his calpacks during the traditional ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The merchant displayed various calpacks in his shop.
meanings.sent3: The calpacks looked like little colorful mushrooms on their heads.
meanings.sent4: The calpacks perched on their heads like miniature mountains.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant calpacks added a touch of culture to the festival.

meanings.definition: To pack or arrange goods in a neat and orderly manner for transportation or storage.
meanings.sent1: She carefully calpacks the fragile items before shipping them.
meanings.sent2: The workers calpacks the boxes efficiently for the long journey.
meanings.sent3: He decided to calpacks his suitcase with all his favorite snacks.
meanings.sent4: The team calpacks their equipment like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Calpacking the books neatly made moving day much easier.
